title: Part 1: The Calling
body: Matías De Stefano’s personal journey to reconnect the consciousness of the planet began at a young age as he started remembering past lives in Atlantis and recording his memories in childhood drawings. As an Indigo child, he developed a close relationship with his spirit guides who helped him make sense of these memories and connect with the natural world to uncover his mission. His unshakeable faith in his higher self led him out of the world of academia and into multidimensional adventures overcoming dark energy encounters, experiencing incredible synchronicities, and navigating near-impossible tasks that tested his resolution. Join Initiation host Matías De Stefano as he recalls his early missions through Argentina and the beginnings of a worldwide movement.
teaser: Join Initiation host Matías De Stefano as he recalls his early missions through Argentina and the beginnings of a worldwide movement.

title: Part 2: 11/11/11
body: Initiation host Matías De Stefano shares how his spirit guides tasked him with a difficult request to gather thousands of people in a very small area to clear and reactivate the energy of that space. With the gathering planned for November 11, 2011, and no infrastructure in place to support that many people, he reached out to his spirit guides for help. It would take a force of nature, a local government crisis, and even social media to pull off this powerful energy clearing event. Seeing Matías’ commitment to the truth and to his mission through all of the doubts, uncertainties, and questions that arose through this process is truly inspiring for all of us and shows how a little faith can have results beyond our wildest imaginings.
teaser: Initiation host Matías De Stefano shares how his spirit guides tasked him with a difficult request to gather thousands of people in a very small area to clear and reactivate the energy of that space.

title: Part 3: Roma Amor
body: Initiation host Matías De Stefano’s mission unfolds into an expansive journey depositing copper keys around the planet to reconnect the Earth’s energy grid. From a frustrating kidnapping in Paraguay to a meeting with the Pope at the Vatican, his spirit guides arranged chance encounters, timely messages, a little humor, and ideal weather conditions that cleared the way to begin healing the history of religion and completing the 11/11/11 process. The power of love and the beauty of nature collide in this episode documenting Matías’ paradigm-shifting spiritual mission.
teaser: Initiation host Matías De Stefano’s mission unfolds into an expansive journey depositing copper keys around the planet to reconnect the Earth’s energy grid.

title: Part 4: The Land of No One
body: Continue the Journey of Remembering with Matías De Stefano to find that the answers we think we want in life might not be what we expect. Sharing the experiences that galvanized his journey from Lake Titicaca to the Great Pyramid, Matías explains how the questions we ask are more important than the answers. Hear Matías channel ethereal spirits in the King’s Chamber as he downloads details for the next steps on his path of reconnection.
teaser: Continue the Journey of Remembering with Matías De Stefano to find how the answers we need in life are not what we expect. Sharing his experiences from Lake Titicaca to the Great Pyramid, Matías explains how questions we ask are more important than the answers.

title: Part 5: The Path of the Dragon
body:
Experience dangerous adventures and mystical meetings with spirits of the beyond as we continue the Journey of Remembering with Matías De Stefano. Embarking on the Path of the Dragon from the south pole to the north, Matías shares how his path transformed through a near-death experience while on a treacherous trek in Tibet, where he encountered the Order of Merlin. 

Exposing the dark side of ego death and the beauty of soul rebirth, Matías highlights the importance of moving beyond fear and into love as he explores his missions at stone circles across the UK from Cornwall, England to the Highlands of Scotland.
teaser: Experience dangerous adventures and mystical meetings with spirits of the beyond as we continue the Journey of Remembering with Matías De Stefano. Matías shares how his path transformed through a near-death experience while on a treacherous trek in Tibet.

title: Part 6: The Power Within
body: Join Matías De Stefano to continue his Journey of Remembering and find out what happens when his planetary mission is faced with the global lockdowns of 2020. Matías opens up about his struggles and how uncanny synchronicities help him overcome doubt. Coming face-to-face with visions from his past, Matías is forced to confront realizations as to why he is on this mission. Discover how Matías’s spirit guides regularly redirect yet reaffirm his path in the midst of an unprecedented event.
teaser: Join Matías De Stefano to continue his Journey of Remembering and find out what happens when his planetary mission is faced with the global lockdowns of 2020. Matías opens up about his struggles and how uncanny synchronicities help him overcome doubt.

title: Part 7: Ancestral Guidance
body: From the pyramids of Egypt to mysteries of the Americas, join Matías De Stefano as he shares his Journey of Remembering. Explaining the necessity of healing the balance of masculine and feminine energies, Matías shows how he is able to do this by bringing information from other levels of consciousness into crystal spheres. Witness Matías channel ancestral guidance to unite the wisdom of the ancient salt flats in North America and align the eyes of the dragon.
teaser: From the pyramids of Egypt to mysteries of the Americas, join Matías De Stefano as he shares his Journey of Remembering. Explaining the necessity of healing the balance of masculine and feminine energies, Matías connects with other levels of consciousness.

title: Part 8: The Egg of the Dragon
body:
How can we experience more synchronicity in our lives by letting go?

Continuing his Journey of Remembering, Matías De Stefano exemplifies how to trust in the natural flow of existence. Sharing how difficulties of the path can show us what we need to learn, Matías reminds us that we can “see the truth everywhere, if we open ourselves.” 

Transporting one of his crystals charged with information of the salt flats to the Great Salt Lake, Matías exposes how subtle energies can lead us to signs from spirit guides and how we can find divine truth by letting go of expectations.
teaser: How can we experience more synchronicity in our lives by letting go? Continuing his Journey of Remembering, Matías De Stefano exemplifies how to trust in the natural flow of existence and reminds us that we can “see the truth everywhere, if we open ourselves.”

title: Preview Season 2 of The Journey of Remembering
body:
NEW SEASON COMING APRIL 22!

Join Matías as he connects with the wise Merlins and leads a group of initiates along the sacred path of stone circles through Great Britain's chakra system. Season 2 promises an unforgettable journey marked by profound connections, exceptional challenges, invigorated purpose, and unshakeable revelations. 

What begins as another initiatic voyage soon evolves into a crucial endeavor to mend the Earth’s magnetic field. Through harnessing the power of the female voice and aiding in the release of the legendary embedded sword, Matías furthers his contribution to our collective evolution.
teaser: Join Matías as he connects with the wise Merlins and leads a group of initiates along the sacred path of stone circles through Great Britain’s chakra system.

title: 12,000-Year Reset & Awakening
body:
At the intersection of his soul’s journey and a global awakening, 2022 was the start of a 12,000-year reset for Matías De Stefano. With the culmination of two transformative events, one in Egypt and one in Argentina, Matías is now free to create his own mission and purpose free from the weight of the previous cycle.

Join Matías as he discusses highlights of these events, the transformations that took place, and what awaits the future as new events begin to unfold.
teaser: At the intersection of his soul’s journey and a global awakening, 2022 was the start of a 12,000-year reset for Matías De Stefano.

title: Healing Earth’s Broken Heart
body:
Millions of years ago, a cataclysmic event broke the Earth’s heart. The time has come to heal that ancient wound.
 
As his new journey begins, Matías De Stefano shares the downloads he received detailing his new planetary mission. As he pieces together the fragments of a mythological puzzle, the hints reveal the secrets to Excalibur, Avalon, and the broken heart of the Earth. These legends tell of catastrophic events that upset the balance of Earth’s magnetic field and the secret to restoring it to its original prominence.
teaser: Millions of years ago, a cataclysmic event broke the Earth’s heart. The time has come to heal that ancient wound.

title: Turning Poison Into Medicine
body:
Matías De Stefano’s journey continues to the UK as he traverses the island’s stone circles and sacred sites where powerful feminine energies are waiting to unite with the divine. These stone circles act like chakras that form a path of initiation. When activated, they turn poison into medicine and start to heal the Earth’s magnetic field. 

Along the way, Matías receives guidance by channeling the Wise Merlins as to how to conduct ceremonies that tap into the power symbols of an apple, a tower, and a pond. Confirmation of this work comes in unexpected ways, such as the formation of a crop circle that appears nearby just after the group initiation.
teaser: Matías De Stefano's journey continues to the UK, exploring stone circles and sacred sites infused with powerful feminine energies. Initiates tread a path where poison transforms into medicine, embarking on a mission to restore the Earth's magnetic field.

title: Awakening the First Wound
body:
The journey through the UK continues with Matías De Stefano leading the group to Stonehenge. Not only is Stonehenge revered as the most significant of all the stone circles, but it also symbolizes the root chakra, serving as a gateway to discovering the "first wound". 

Matías explains that the "first wound" happens when one declares, “I can’t.” During the activation ceremony at Stonehenge, a Wise Merlin imparts deeper insights. He guides the group to release the tension, open themselves to affirm “I can”, and to sow the seed of unconditional love.
teaser: The journey through the UK continues with Matías De Stefano leading the group to Stonehenge. Not only is Stonehenge revered as the most significant of all the stone circles, but it also symbolizes the root chakra, serving as a gateway to discovering the "first wound".

title: Reconnecting to Your True Nature
body:
As the pilgrimage continues through the plexus of Great Britain, Matías De Stefano illuminates the power of detachment and balancing the feminine ego.

From the Nine Ladies Stone Circle to the Druid's temple nestled in an enchanted forest, Matías and the Merlin deliver vital messages to inspire the initiates to remember their true nature and harness the power of being connected with every living being.

The episode culminates as Matias channels a Druid, who leads a powerful pineal gland ceremony, preparing the group to enter the next phase of the profound journey into the upper chakras of Avalon and themselves.
teaser: As the pilgrimage continues through the plexus of Great Britain, Matías De Stefano illuminates the power of detachment and balancing the feminine ego.

title: Weaving Metatron’s Cube Through the Heart
body:
At Lake District, the group connects with the energy of Castlerigg, where the heart chakra acts as a machine that pulses time and space.

As the group journeys through the nine lakes, Matías shares that the area mirrors the nine dimensions of the heart, which also aligns with the structure of Metatron's cube.  Their purpose is to go to the center of creation and bring individual balance, thereby creating harmony for the whole land sealed through a channeled song.

After overcoming challenges during the ascent at Arthur’s Seat, the group celebrates and weaves the geometric pattern of Metatron's cube through song. This act signifies the integration of heart and mind, achieved through the power of the voice.
teaser: At Lake District, the group connects with the energy of Castlerigg, where the heart chakra acts as a machine that pulses time and space.

title: Activating 8D Frequencies
body:
As the initiates journey into the eye of Loch Ness and the pineal gland, they unlock their inner vision and creative potential. 

Once a site for burial activities, the sacred ground of Clava Cairns aligns with the constellation of Orion, serving as a portal to other dimensions. Here, the group glimpses the vast possibilities of the universe and receive confirmation from mysterious crop circles that emerge, reinforcing their activities and connection to higher realms.

In a profound revelation, the group taps into 8th-dimensional energy, where Matías embodies a spider, weaving frequencies to create the Eye of God.
teaser: As the initiates journey into the eye of Loch Ness and the pineal gland, they unlock their inner vision and creative potential.

title: Creating the Rainbow Bridge
body:
The group embarks on their final journey to the Ring of Brodgar (earth) with the ultimate goal of connecting the land with Asgard (the realm of the gods). Here, they receive the white light of enlightenment through the crown chakra to achieve their quest of bridging heaven and earth.   

At the final stone circle ritual, Matías explains how all mythologies and traditions are interconnected, converging into a single narrative. He compares it to the pilgrimage through the chakra system, where every color merges into a unified ray, symbolizing the rainbow bridge to divine oneness.
teaser: The group embarks on their final journey to the Ring of Brodgar (earth) with the ultimate goal of connecting the land with Asgard (the realm of the gods). Here, they receive the white light of enlightenment to bridge heaven and earth.
